thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: Keith Henry
thread.title_full: Poseidon Expeditions reviewed by Keith Henry

author: Keith Henry
title: Keith Henry
text: Nothing to add that has not been said before, excellent cruise on Sea Spirit, smaller vessel added bonus and was the reason for choosing Poseidon. From booking, arriving, departing, good food, good staff and a good mix of guests, all of which when put together lead to it being an unforgettable holiday and would love to do it all again, even the plunge. Only disappointment was no camping - but that is nature for you.
